episodes.title: Ep. 83 // Venus Rx in Scorpio: The Whispers of our Ancestors
episodes.description: When Venus starts dancing in the dark, so does our connection to love.  The beautiful illumination Venus brings to the sky as the evening or morning star is something so undeniable, so visceral, so captivating, that we realize how much we miss her only when she is gone. . Ancient symbology and story throughout time has tried to capture this rommance humans have always had with this incandescent planet. . Venus has begun her Retrograde, as of October 5th 2018 in NYC (correction from recording) and we mear mortals walking this earth now start the mourning process of our dear Venus and our hearts.  What do we really need and want to feel and experience true authentic love? . As Venus will be resting still for her underworld dance in the sign of Scorpio, we have a very unique and distinctive opportunity to meet our ancestors our DNA, our bloodline to see how we landed in the shoes we currently walk.  How did our grandmother's experience with love, effect ours?  Did the call of our grandfather's hearts, create the orchestra of our hearts symphony? . We are not at random.  We are a collection of stories and experiences that are recycled and handed down generation after generation, creating the present moment.  This Venus Retrograde, askes us to listen to the whispers of our ancestors, who gifted us our unique heart.  What is love?  This dance in the dark, will lead us to this answer. . episodes.title: Ep. 80 // The Shadow Side of the 12 Signs of the Zodiac
episodes.description:
Meeting one's shadow is a HEROIC journey. Having the courage to see one's own demons and the demons that live in others, is the path of a warrior. This path is not always obvious or easy to walk down. In many cases, it takes a heinous, frightful, unbelievable event to show us the true nature of the dark that lives in and out of the human experience. When we are forced down this path, forced to look in the mirror, forced to ask the hard questions, we will have officially entered the innermost cave on the Hero’s Journey. On this heroic journey, we will need allies and support networks, some solid feet on the ground, and a sense of faith. And of course, Astrology can be beneficial on this path.  

Jupiter is currently living and breathing in the underworld of Scorpio. He is illuminating the darkness in our individual lives and in the collective. His current trine to Neptune in Pisces heightens this energy and the Full Moon in Pisces on the 26th might be a real ass kicker! Right now, we are being forced to not only look at the dark but also look to how we try to escape it through denial, addiction, and false worship. We are being faced with our delusions about others and ourselves, which have denied us from seeing important truths. Turns out, evil DOES exist. It is naïve to try and deny this through positive thinking, rose-colored spectacles or rejection of gut feelings. 

Where do these demons come from? How can humans be so sinister and evil to one another? The definition of evil to me is the individual who rejects their shadow and instead lets it grow. In worse cases, into a monster. Right now, there is a battle cry from the Gods and Goddesses above. They scream: “LOOK! Don’t turn away!”

It is painful, it is scary, it is intense, it is IMPORTANT!

In this week’s podcast, I will be discussing the importance of looking deeply in the mirror and accepting truths about the nature of ourselves and humanity. Accepting that not everyone comes to us with good intentions and how to trust when you’ve encountered true darkness inside and outside. I will also discuss the necessity of support and tribe during these times.

To support this work and get even more info ‘bout this shit, join the TRIBE at patron.com/bridgingrealities

episodes.title: Ep. 79 // Audience Q+A: The Solar Eclipse in Leo
episodes.description: The 3rd and final Eclipse of the season comes Aug. 11th.  In this episode, I answer a few questions from listeners, focusing on the importance of the Sun!  I discuss ancient Egyptians Mythology, to inquire, how they may have interpreted these times.  I also discuss, how to avoid obsessing over astrology.  To watch the full episode + bonus episode + to support my work, join the TRIBE at patreon.com/bridgingrealities

episodes.title: Ep. 78 // Importance of Cultural Diversity in Astrology with Cheryl Hopkins
episodes.description:
The past few years have shown the world the depth of fear, racism, sexism and cultural divide’s that create so much anxiety in life.  We are in a time of looking through our personal pasts, and our historical past.  We are being asked to look at storylines which have brought us to this moment and we now have the opportunity, right now, to change them.  
.
In this weeks episode, I bring onto the podcast, Cheryl Hopkins of astrologyempowers.com to discuss the importance of cultural and racial sensitivity when working as an astrologer.  
.
If you enjoy this episode and want to support the podcast please consider joining the TRIBE at patron.com/bridgingrealities

episodes.title: Ep. 77 // Empowering the Feminine in Your Chart with Allie Couch of Cosmomuse
episodes.description:
Tomorrow we experience a powerful Lunar Eclipse in AQUARIUS, so in this episode, I wanted to be sure to include some often times, left out ladies!  Included in this Lunar Eclipse on July 27th, 2018, is not only the Sun and the Moon, squaring Uranus and Jupiter during a Mercury Retrograde and a Mars Retrograde, but it is also highly important to be reminded that Athena, Juno, and Lilith will also highly influence this energy.  The Wife, The Daughter, and the Rebel Chick.
.
In today's episode I bring back to Bridging Realities Allie Couch of Cosmomuse to discuss the importance of environmental themes associated to the zodiacal seasons, the significance of the Goddess and Famine energy so often overlooked in astrology and what inspired Allie to create this stunning publication.  To learn more about Allie and to purchase your copy of Cosmomuse, please visit cosmomuse.com and use the coupon code bridgingrealities to receive 15% off your copy.

episodes.title: Ep. 75 // Real Life Retrograde + Eclipse Cycle: Necessary Endings
episodes.description: Ok, ok, ok.  It's eclipse season.  Shit be whack, and things be changing. Every Astrologer has something to say about it... What I want to share with you, is my very personal experience of Saturn in Capricorn, Mars Retrograde, and The Eclipses, and how perfectly these transits have the potential to fuck our lives up, to re-route us onto a more appropriate path. My hope for those of you listening who have felt a LOT of change is to let you know I see you, I feel you, I hear you, and I am there for you.  Listen in and be sure to hear my offer at the end and if you want to take me up on what I'm throwing out there to you and the universe, be sure to email us at info@accessibleastrology.com.  {Image by Tareck: Red Sea, Egypt}

episodes.description: Happy Solstice! Happy Beginnings! The chart for this Solstice is all about Polarities, Relationships and the Cry for Balance! In this episode I take a night stroll through the streets of Cairo, Egypt while contemplating the importance of being in the present moment and finding the beauty in the moment.  Be sure to listen around 26min! It's my favorite part of the episode! And be sure to Subscribe and Review the Podcast.  Enjoy! Sending much love from Egypt! {Image by Yours Truly}

episodes.title: Ep. 73 // A BIG Fucking Day! Uranus into Taurus + Taurus New Moon!
episodes.description: Welp!  Today is fucking huge!  At 9:17 am MST on Tuesday, May 15h 2018, Uranus moves into Taurus, just after the Taurus New Moon, AND… I’m off to Egypt!  So for this grand and momentous day, I bring back to Bridging Realities, Tareck, my love, my partner and the man I will whisk away to Egypt with.  We have an authentic chat about all of these changes and I offer a helpful guided meditation around the 40min marker to help ground you during these somewhat noisy times.  May all the changes happening within us and though-out the world, be of highest benefit to all sentient beings.  So much love to every single one of you!

episodes.title: Ep. 70 // Heart + Chart with Rachael Starr Bruck, MA
episodes.description:
Often times in Astrology, we can find ourselves overusing our heads, looking to the astrology chart to predict the future and at times trying to control the outcome, especially when we find ourselves in big transitional times.  In Ep. 70, I bring back Rachael Starr Bruck of WayHomeHealing.com, to discuss the importance of Presence, Breathe, Ceremony and The Heart.  This is a great episode to be seated for, as there is meditation, mindful contemplation and encouragement to be still.  When the world outside and inside of us is going crazy, we can use our chart and most importantly, breathe into the heart!  Be sure to visit AcessibleAstrology.com for more information and to book your reading.  {Image @penabranca}

episodes.title: Ep. 69 // TRANSITION TIME!
episodes.description:
In life, there are moments that sweep us away.  Sweep us away and direct us onto a new path.  These changes are reflected in our astrology chart by way of transits, progressions, profections and others...  Understanding our chart shows us how we change and how life redirects us.  In this episode, I discuss changes I am going through and how they are reflected in the bigger changes happening in the sky.  How do we learn to balance the yin and yang of life during these transitional times?  We are being asked to relax and trust.  Join me for a walk on the beach while I muse these ideas.  To get your chart read, visit https://www.accessibleastrology.com/accessibleastrology-bookareading.  For US citizens be sure to book before May, as my availability will decrease.  {Image by Eugenia}

episodes.description:

We also speak to the evident discontent of Mother Earth/Gaia and bring compassion to our shared experience as women and what is expected of us.
.

episodes.description: What a week so far! We share our personal insights and experiences about the current astrological 'weather', AND, drumroll...we also introduce our Patreon page where you can now donate and receive awesome astro-inspired goodies. Your contributions will sustain us so we can continue to deliver rich, enlightening, weekly astrology podcasts. We thank you and hope you enjoy! Visit https://www.patreon.com/user?u=4524601 to check out our Patreon page. [image by @ododua.aum]

episodes.title: Ep. 35 // Exploring Juno with Sol With Jonassen
episodes.description: We're back after the holiday for another great show -- this time Sol With Jonassen joins us again for a beautiful discussion about another asteroid goddess, Juno, which was conjunct the recent New Moon in Sagittarius. Artwork by @danielpashman. Enjoy!

episodes.title: Ep. 34 // Gratitudes and Reflections on Interpreting Transits
episodes.description: On today's episode we share what it is we're grateful for and discuss interpretation of personal astrological transits. We thank you for your continued love and support and wish you a healthy and joyful holiday!

episodes.title: Ep. 33 // Thoughts on Saturn in Sagittarius, plus Sabian Symbols with Kimberly Anne Christensen
episodes.description:
Tune in to today's episode to hear more of our sentiments about the current social climate with regards to Saturn in Sagittarius and how this is showing up both personally and within the collective. Then switch gears with our guest, Kimberly Anne Christensen, who offers a new way of integrating the Sabian Symbols, numerology, and astrology together for a unique perspective of the natal chart. You can find Kimberly Anne online at: http://www.lifepathinternational.com or through her facebook group:
https://www.facebook.com/groups/SabianAstroNumerology/.
Peace, love + gratitude xo (image source: @wildwitchofthewest)

episodes.title: Ep. 32 // Election Reflections
episodes.description: No matter who you voted for or how you're feeling today, an important thing to remember is, we're all in this life together. Tune into today's episode as we share our reflections on the election outcome and how this momentous time aligns with astrology and historical patterns. We also discuss Pluto's inherent potential and share insight into how we may best help each another navigate this transition. Sending compassionate love to all of our global family!(mural art in San Francisco, artist unknown).

episodes.title: Ep. 31 // Returning to Wholeness: Ayurveda and Astrology with Cherise Bangs
episodes.description: We're back! After our long-winded introduction and catch up chat, Cherise Bangs joins us to discuss her work with ayurveda and yoga therapy. We briefly explore how the doshas may be found in the tropical/western natal chart and how we can best align with the cycles and rhythms of nature. You can find more info about Cherise on her website: http://www.cherise.com/. {Image of Dhanwantari Jayanti, Ayurveda's patron diety whose celebration was just 5 days ago! So timely.} To support our efforts with the podcast, we graciously accept donations through our website: http://www.bridgingrealities.com/. Thank you for listening! Enjoy!

episodes.title: Ep. 30 // Chart exploration with Full Moon auction winner
episodes.description: This week we share our musings about the last days of Libra season and this week's Mars/Pluto conjunction. Then we explore the natal chart and transits of our Full Moon Auction winner, Melia. This is another great episode for astrology students who are curious to see how certain aspects and placements manifest in real life. We hope you enjoy the conversation! {epic image by Devany Litha Wolfe aka @serpentfire}

episodes.title: Ep. 29 // Astrology + Healing Modalities: EMDR Part I
episodes.description: On this episode we speak to Sara of Conifer Counseling (conifercounseling.com) who works closely with Eugenia to find the most optimal healing strategies for their clients. Tune in to hear more about the amazing work Sara does with her clients using EMDR as a healing technique and how this truly bridges realities with astrology. We explore a client's chart as an example. This is a really rich subject so this will be part I of more to come! We hope you enjoy!

episodes.title: Ep. 28 // Progressions and Astro-Chat with Kelly Surtees
episodes.description: The lovely Kelly Surtees (kellysastrology.com) joins us again for an astro-chat! We reflect on the recent New Moon in Libra, Jupiter in Libra, and share insights about progressions and how they work with predictive astrology. We hope you enjoy! {Image source unknown}

episodes.title: Ep. 27 // Pluto in Scorpio: Sex, Death, + Money with Timothy Halloran
episodes.description: Pluto is the planet that represents transformation through sex, death and rebirth. It's the Phoenix archetype emerging from the ashes of destruction. It takes us to the dark recesses of our own underworld -- our unconscious desires, impulses, passions, and fears. As the ruler of Scorpio, the archetype of Pluto is magnified. On this episode, we invited astrologer Timothy Halloran to explore the topic of the Pluto in Scorpio generation. Tune in to hear his eloquent interpretation of this placement as we get intimate with the taboo subjects of sex, death, and money. For more information about Timothy or to contact him for a reading, please visit his website: rasalilahealing.com or @rasalilahealing {beautiful image of Pluto by @i.h8.shoes]

episodes.title: Ep. 26 // Jupiter in Libra - Make Love Not War + other sentiments
episodes.description: Isn't this collage by Katelyn aka @low_tide_lover a perfect image for Jupiter in Libra?! So good! Join us on this episode as we share our take on Jupiter's shift into the sign of Libra. We explore the archetype of Jupiter and how it's sojourn through Libra might touch upon themes of love, relationships, harmony, finding balance, creating beauty, decision making, legal issues, communication, conflict, and more! We had fun with this one. And, in honor of this astrological shift and our interest in diving deeper into the sea of relationship astrology, we're both offering a 25% discount off of our relationship readings (applies to all types of relationships!) Use code LIBRALOVE at checkout via daniellepolgar.com or eugeniakrok.com. Equinox blessings, peace, and LOVE to all!

episodes.title: Ep. 25 // The Lunar Eclipse + Guest Chart Exploration
episodes.description: The final eclipse of 2016 is almost here! Tomorrow's Lunar Eclipse in Pisces allows and invites us to release, forgive, let go, and heal. We discuss our personal experiences with this eclipse season and also dive into the natal chart of our monthly donation/auction winner and guest, Sarah. This is a great episode to explore your own interpretations of her chart alongside our interpretations -- a perfect opportunity to practice and learn more about astrology! So grab a pen and paper and tune in! {image by @penabranca, penabranca.co}

episodes.title: Ep. 24 // Astrology, Yoni Eggs, and Healing Ancestral Wounds with Jillian Anderson
episodes.description: Tune in to our latest episode with guest Jillian Anderson (jillian-anderson.com), goddess of the yoni egg practice and female empowerment. Join us as we dive deep into the depths of the divine feminine as we discuss healing ancestral wounds, creativity, abundance, and changing the future. We also explore Jillian's chart in detail which highlights the gifts she brings to the world. Juicy, touching, vulnerable, and inspiring goodness. Enjoy everyone! {Beautiful image by Vanja Vukelic @merakilabbe}

episodes.title: Ep. 23 // The Solar Eclipse in Virgo
episodes.description: We're back to chat about tomorrow's Solar Eclipse! Enjoy this short and sweet conversation. (Image by Dani from the 2012 Solar Eclipse at the Symbiosis Gathering).

episodes.title: Ep. 22 // Saturn Return with Tiff DeLancy and Maya Hackett
episodes.description:
With all the energy around Saturn and Mars this week, we thought it was appropriate to discuss one of the hottest topics in astrology: the Saturn Return! We invited guests Tiff DeLancy and Maya Hackett to talk a bit about their amazing collaborative community called Saturn*s Sister, and we share stories about our experiences with our own Saturn Return journeys. We hope you enjoy! (epic image by @serpentfire).

To connect with Tiff and Maya on social media, you can find them on instagram at @namastetiff and @urbanorganica. The first Saturn*s Sister circle opens on September 1st! Check it out here: saturnssister.com

episodes.title: Ep. 21 // Full Moon in Aquarius Vibes with special guest
episodes.description: The Full Moon is shining light on all things Aquarius tonight - which of course, includes ASTROLOGY! On today's episode, after our love-infused intro, our monthly donation winner joins to discuss her natal chart. We share our interpretations of some of her aspects and discuss generational patterns and other astrological concepts. To participate in our donation 'auction', please visit us and donate at http://www.bridgingrealities.com and at the New Moon we will select the highest donor to join us as a guest on our podcast (or for a private reading with us). Enjoy and full moon blessings to all!

episodes.title: Ep. 20 // Communing with the Moon with guests Kristina Wingeier and April Miller-McMurtry
episodes.description: We're back! In this episode we explore our relationship with the Moon with guests Kristina Wingeier and April Miller-McMurtry of The Lunar Womb and The Moon is My Calendar. We discuss the importance of re-aligning with the Moon and using it as a guide toward understanding our inner selves and how we relate to the natural and sacred cycles of our lives. You can learn more about Kristina and April through their websites: unfoldingtheself.com/, themoonismycalendar.com/, www.thelunarwomb.com/. Enjoy this nurturing chat! [beautiful imagery by @trashriot]

episodes.title: Ep. 19 // Cosmic Chat with Kelly Surtees
episodes.description:
Astrologer and friend, Kelly Surtees joins us again! This time to chat about Mars + Saturn stationing direct, Antares, polarities, signs in their exaltations, and finding balance in our both/and universe! We had such a great time recording this one, we hope you enjoy!

Check out Kelly's offerings at: kellysastrology.com

[Image by @leafandpetalvintage]

episodes.title: Ep. 18 // A Spontaneous Confession Session: NeoFeminism
episodes.description: In this spontaneous episode, we dive into a hot topic that is 'up' for the both of us right now, and might be for you too, -- NEO-FEMINISM. We waxed about the historical wave that got us here as a collective, and we ride the tide out into the future potential of an egalitarian, partnership society. This is SUCH a good one, you won't want to miss it.

episodes.title: Ep. 17 // Mercury: A New Perspective with guest Jason Holley
episodes.description: Mercury has received a lot of negative press in pop culture over the recent years, but there's so much more to learn about this valuable  archetype. Astrologer, therapist, and teacher Jason Holley joins us to offer his brilliant insights and playful perspective which provides a new understanding of our dear friend Mercury. This is one episode we've been super excited to record, and it's just as lovely as we imagined it would be! We think you'll enjoy it too!

episodes.title: Ep. 16 // News, Consciousness, Antares, + the charts of Teenagers
episodes.description:
We're back with some new ideas about our offerings, public service announcements, and an exploration into the light and dark elements of the Antares/Pluto conjunction found in current teenager's charts. It's a quick one, but it's deep! Enjoy!

*We now have a landing page (www.bridgingrealities.com) where you can submit donations to help us bring you more astrology! And you can now follow us on Instagram @bridgingrealities.

episodes.title: Ep. 15 // Astrology + Sexuality with Elizabeth Wood + VerDarLuz
episodes.description: As Mars stations direct today, we dive into a group discussion with tantric educator, Elizabeth Wood and shamanic astrologer, VerDarLuz. Eugenia recently attended their profound workshop around tantra and astrology. Together we all explore how astrology can guide us towards a deeper understanding of our sexuality and how it can help us embrace this sacred gift of expression. You can learn more about Elizabeth's work at her website: http://sensualu.com/ and more about VerDarLuz's offerings at: http://shamanstorch.com/about-verdarluz/ and findyourpowerplaces.com.

episodes.title: Ep. 14 // Rambling Reflections + It's All About Love
episodes.description: We're back! And we're doing what we do best -- shooting the breeze and catching up and talking about astrology. This episode floats around and follows its own tempo as we reflect on Mars Retrograde, with a few technological interruptions along the way. Please pardon the poor sound quality as Danielle's internet connection was sub-par.

episodes.title: Ep. 13 // Uranus: Breaking Down and Breaking Through
episodes.description:
This week Eugenia speaks with Sol With Jonassen about the dynamic planet, Uranus. It often represents where our lives are breaking down, breaking through, or where we are feeling surprised. 

Uranus is the liberator, the shocker and the mover. It is the higher mind that pierces through the veil of illusion and reveals the hidden truth. In this episode we explore this fascinating archetype from an evolutionary point of view, where we see how it behaves from the subconscious to the conscious level of awareness -- from shock to conscious revolution. 

For more information on upcoming event hosted by Eugenia and Sol, please visit: https://www.facebook.com/events/1109555129106354/?notif_t=plan_user_associated&notif_id=1465573351750304

episodes.title: Ep. 12 // Catching Up - Retrograde Reflections and More...
episodes.description: Hey beautiful podcast family! We're back and we're sharing a little bit about what we've been up to ,and reflecting on the Mars and Saturn retrogrades. Enjoy!

episodes.title: Ep. 11 // Embracing the Feminine w/ Sol Jonassen Pt. I: CERES
episodes.description: Astrologer Sol Jonassen of www.sol-with.com shares her eloquent wisdom about the asteroid goddesses. We aimed to address 4 Asteroid Goddesses in one hour but we realized this topic deserves much more air time and thus, this is Part 1 of 4 episodes in a series on the asteroids. Ceres is the main focus for this show and we look forward to diving deeper with other asteroids on the next episodes. We hope you enjoy it as much as we did!  If you are interested in purchasing Sol and Eugenia's workshop on the subject, please follow this link: http://www.eugeniakrok.com/#!product-page/ovwz2/efedabf1-3ebf-8ac1-06d2-a979baaa6b58

episodes.title: Ep. 10 // Fertility + Astrology with Kelly Surtees
episodes.description:
This one goes out to all of our lady listeners (but can be helpful for men to know, too!) We invited Kelly Surtees on the show to discuss how fertility shows up in a woman's birth chart. We also look at 3 chart examples to better understand how these fascinating concepts show up for real women. Enjoy our rich + juicy conversation! 

**To book a reading with Kelly visit http://kellysastrology.com/

episodes.title: Ep. 9 // Modern + Traditional Astrology with Leisa Schaim
episodes.description: We invited astrologer, Leisa Schaim to share her wisdom and insight about modern and traditional astrology. We also briefly mention other forms of astrology as well. Enjoy the rich discussion and here is a link to Leisa's website: http://leisaschaim.com/

episodes.title: Ep. 8 // Back to Basics, The Zodiac Part 2
episodes.description: In this one, we pop-up to the top half of the chart to discuss the next 6 signs and houses of the zodiac.

episodes.title: Ep. 7 // Back to Basics, The Zodiac Part 1
episodes.description: We bring it back to basics and share our interpretations of the first 6 signs + houses of the zodiac.

episodes.title: Ep. 6 // Mars Retrograde w Guest Astrologer Ari Moshe
episodes.description: In this episode, astrologer Ari Moshe joins us to share his poetic insights into the upcoming Mars Retrograde.

episodes.title: Ep. 5 // Reflections on the Lunar Eclipse
episodes.description: We briefly discuss our sentiments and reflections about the recent Lunar Eclipse, as well as touch upon Pluto's transit through the sign of Capricorn and how that relates to the elections.

episodes.title: Ep. 4 // Mental Health, Transpersonal Psychology, Self-Care, + More!
episodes.description: Join us as we discuss how important it is to consider mental health training as part of an astrology practice. We also share the real story on how we met and riff about transpersonal psychology and self-care.

episodes.title: Ep. 3 // Upcoming Solar Eclipse in Pisces
episodes.description: Listen into our conversation about the upcoming Solar Eclipse - we also have one of Eugenia's clients on the show to share her story about how previous eclipse impacted her life.

episodes.title: Ep. 2 // Our Favorite Astrology Books
episodes.description: On our 2nd episode, we share a little more about our personal stories of how we learned astrology. We also mention some of our favorite astrology books.

episodes.title: Ep. 1 // Introduction
episodes.description: Join us as we dive in head first to our podcast that's been a year in the making of our minds!
